content.question: A country in the first stage of the demographic transition demonstrates which of the following?

choices.label: High birth rates, but low death rates
Low birth rates, low death rates, and low rates of population growth
High birth rates, high death rates, and low rates of population growth
High birth rates, high death rates, and high rates of population growth

content.answer: High birth rates, high death rates, and low rates of population growth

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe geographic concepts, processes, models, and theories.
